summary: 14-year old genius Eli is rejected from Harvard, and ends up at Ivy League wannabe Whittman-U. There, Eli meets 41 year-old Leo, a gambler who has dropped out of life to enroll in college, who teaches him every bad habit he knows.
cast: Alex Wolff|Parker Posey|Brendan Fraser|Julia Garner|Michael Oberholtzer|Elisabeth Hower|Josefina Scaglione|Toby Huss|Greta Lee|Teddy Bergman|Robin de Jesus|Curtis Gillen|A.J. Shively|Kevin-Alan Daniels|Nilaja Sun|Kimiko Glenn|Ash Christian|Spencer Leigh|Alex Draper|Brittany Taylor Visser|Sas Goldberg|Arjun Gupta|Jeffrey Omura|Austin Pendleton|Lizzy DeClement|Fred Melamed|Damian Young|Joseph Medeiros|Ben Hollandsworth|Azudi Onyejekwe|Colman Domingo|Laura Butler|Edward Gelbinovich|Austin Gelfman|Beth Katehis|Skyler Marshall|Elyse Mueller|Ezra Nachman|Adam Teper|Jeffrey M. Weber
title: Ni un pelo de listo
